summary: A man takes his family on a camping trip and becomes convinced they are being stalked by the legendary monster of the New Jersey Pine Barrens: the Jersey Devil.
cast: Stephen Moyer|Mia Kirshner|Allie MacDonald|Peter DaCunha|David Keeley|Erik Knudsen|Shamier Anderson|Max Topplin|Michael Copeman|Shawn Ashmore|Athena Karkanis|J. LaRose|Chantelle Chung|Naomi Snieckus|Matt Baram|Marty Adams|Demore Barnes|Francois Dagenais|Jason Detheridge|Dennis Long|Tatiana Ivanova|John Fleming|Kathy Maloney|Lina Giornofelice
title: The Barrens
